game.name: Snack Escort
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Who would’ve thought that a roguelike, card game, and tower defence could come together over a basket of food? Travel through magical lands filled with hungry creatures, collect cards and artifacts that shape your strategy with every run. Escort your food through this whimsical fantasy world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Who would’ve thought that a roguelike, card game, and tower defence could come together over a basket of food? Travel through magical lands filled with hungry creatures, collect cards and artifacts that shape your strategy with every run. Escort your food through this whimsical fantasy world.
